name: Forest.tscn
description:
You find yourself in a surreal environment. The sky is purple. Everything is suspended in a void. A city stands nearby. It seems normal at the first glance, but as you approach it becomes clear that something is wrong.
Check out the community section to discuss the game.

This is quite cryptic. But, do be assured, there is a "victory" condition. 

Made in Godot Engine

Most assets by Quentin McGlynn ("Call Me Tess").
Some audio recorded by Aysia Evans.

Damage shader from https://github.com/Ahopness/GodotRetro. Shader originally created by "keijiro", ported to Godot by Ahopness.

Some textures taken from CC0textures.com.
